Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides for the issuance of temporary retail permits by the state liquor authority; repealer
Summary: Provides for the issuance of temporary retail permits by the state liquor authority if certain conditions are met.
LawCode: Rpld & add ยง97-a, ABC L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to the issuing of temporary retail permits; and to repeal section 97-a of such law relating thereto
